title: S17 Ep125: Ripped From The Headlines/Dumb Crimes-Stupid Criminals/ Spooky Season Edition
itunes:title: Ripped From The Headlines/Dumb Crimes-Stupid Criminals/ Spooky Season Edition
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents Ripped From The Headlines/Dumb Crimes-Stupid Criminals/ Spooky Season Edition with Beer City Bruiser!

With the world and it's media being focused on just a few topics, we dig up the true crime topics that everyone is either talking about online, or you might have missed altogether!

Tim and Bruiser talk about the trial for the Parkland Shooter, the Raleigh shooting, An Indiana Catholic School teacher who decided to make up a kill list of students and staff, and a self described "incel" who plead guilty to planning a mass shooting of women!

PLUS DUMB CRIMES AND STUPID CRIMINALS!!

Check out where Beer City Bruiser will be in your area:  https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
